creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: four bands, all of black fabric; top narrow band has orange and yellow organic machine stitching; three larger bands of predominately magenta, green and yellow embroidery in variations of diamond and other geometric motifs; fringes of various beads, sequins and bells; mirror and button details
medium: Cotton, beads, buttons, sequins, mirror disks; embroidery
title: Swati curtain
